setup_office_full.description: task related to setup an office
setup_office_full.goal: remove the objects from the shelf and locker, and put the desk, the lamp, the shelf, and the locker in the living room after removing the objects from them

setup_office_locker_empty.description: task related to setup an office, the locker is already empty
setup_office_locker_empty.goal: remove the objects from the shelf and locker, and put the desk, the lamp, the shelf, and the locker in the living room after removing the objects from them

setup_office_shelf_locker_empty.description: task related to setup an office, the shelf and the locker are already empty
setup_office_shelf_locker_empty.goal: remove the objects from the shelf and locker, and put the desk, the lamp, the shelf, and the locker in the living room after removing the objects from them

setup_office_shelf_missing_locker_empty.description: task related to setup an office but the shelf is missing and the locker is already empty
setup_office_shelf_missing_locker_empty.goal: remove the objects from the shelf and locker, and put the desk, the lamp, the shelf, and the locker in the living room after removing the objects from them
